title: What is your review of Anthroposophy?
description: Answer (1 of 2): A little personal background: I first met Anthroposophy when I was 19 years old. When I was very young 5-7 years of age, I had read a lot of science and had Christianity from my parents. I felt there was truth in Christianity and truth in science, but I couldn't see how I could...
